Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka comes into the ODI series with momentum, having recently secured a 2-1 T20I series win against the West Indies.
This ODI series will give Sri Lanka a chance to build squad depth, especially with the return of key players from injury.
It also provides an opportunity to test younger players like Wickramasinghe and Shiraz in preparation for future competitions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The ODI series will commence on 20 October 2024 at the PICS, Pallekele.
Others: Chamindu Wickramasinghe earns his maiden ODI call-up
Wanindu Hasaranga and Dilshan Madushanka return from injuries
Mohamed Shiraz retains his spot in the squad
All-rounder Chamika Karunaratne and spinner Akila Dananjaya have been left out of the squad
The pace attack will miss Matheesha Pathirana, who is still recovering from a shoulder injury sustained before the India series.
